title: Coronavirus outbreak hits Alberta's Kearl Lake oil sands camp - The Globe and Mail
description: Coronavirus outbreak hits Alberta's Kearl Lake oil sands camp The Globe and Mail Health officials monitor COVID-19 outbreak at Kearl Lake oilsands facility CBC.ca Why is the Calgary zone such a hotspot for COVID-19? Global News Alberta announces $53 million i…
content: Mining operations at the Kearl Oil Sands project near Fort McMurray, on Tuesday, June 13, 2017. Dr. Deena Hinshaw said Wednesday that Alberta Health Services has implemented outbreak procedures at the Kearl site to minimize the risk of coronavirus transmissio… [+4020 chars]
